alert.note: Alert for Androscoggin; Coastal Waldo; Interior Waldo; Kennebec; Knox; Lincoln; Sagadahoc (Maine) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued January 20 at 10:49AM EST until January 20 at 7:00PM EST by NWS Gray/Portland
info.description: ...SNOW CONTINUES TO IMPACTS THE AREA TODAY... .Light snow will continue on and off through much of the day, with additional light accumulations expected. ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 PM EST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Snow. Additional snow accumulations up to two inches for a storm total of 6 to 9 inches. * WHERE...Portions of south central and southwest Maine. * WHEN...Until 7 PM EST this evening. * IMPACTS...Much of the area has seen snowfall to around 5 to 7 inches leading to snow covered roads. Light snow will continue on and off through sunset with additional accumulations up to two inches that could keep roads slick into the evening commute.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions can be obtained by going to newengland511.org
